name: DislocationOrSprainOfThoseJointsAndLigamentsLocatedInTheLumbarSpineOrPelvis
title: Dislocation or Sprain of those Joints and Ligaments Located in the Lumbar Spine or Pelvis
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-8 (MRI Lumbar Spine for Low Back Pain), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. In calculation of OP-8, diagnoses of dislocations or sprains of the joints and ligaments located in the lumbar spine or pelvis (or other low back pain diagnosis) must appear on the MRI study claim to be eligible for inclusion in the measure's initial patient population.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes for dislocations or sprains of the joints and ligaments located in the lumbar spine or pelvis not captured by an alternative diagnostic code.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a diagnosis of dislocation or sprain of the joints and ligaments located in the lumbar spine or pelvis.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes for dislocation or sprain of the joints and ligaments located in the lumbar spine or pelvis are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes not associated with diagnoses of dislocations or sprains of the joints and ligaments located in the lumbar spine or pelvis are excluded from this value set. Terminologies other than ICD-10 are also excluded from this value set.)
